page.title: 09Farming
page.content: Mainly{dairy farming.}9 farms in area including experimental{University {dairy farm.}Land is also used for{corn {crops}and{vegetables.}Good pasture. Cows, sheep, pigs and battery farmed chickens are raised. All animals and poultry are also used for meat produc_ tion. {Dairy produce}includes milk, butter, cream, cheese and yoghurt. A good cow produces 40_80 gallons a day. Milking is all mechanised. Cows are milked twice daily at 6a.m. and 4p.m. Animals are fed on hay and sileage during the winter months. Sileage is made from grass, clover and rape. {Animal and crop production}is governed by consumer demand. Growth in demand for frozen meats has led farmers to raise animals of a standard size. {Battery farming}is very cruel but farmers make more money this way.
